attributes.action: Allow the routine vaccination of childrem against chicken pox
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chicken pox(varicella vaccine)in children is an awful condition. watching them suffer the skin rashes with very little that can be done to aleviate the itching and soreness is very difficult as a parent.A varicella vaccine has been available since 1995 to inoculate against the disease.I ask that the government makes this vaccine available to all parents in order to prevent this terrible disease. Please support this petition.
